summary: JUST PURCHASED THIS CAR USED. 91, K MILES. BRAKES FAILED ON ME. I TURNED AROUND IN A PARKING LOT MAKING A SHARP LEFT TURN AND PULLED BACK OUT ONTO THE ROAD. I WAS ONLY ABOUT 20 YARDS FROM A STOP SIGN. WHEN I APPROACHED THE STOP SIGN, MY BREAKS WENT TO THE FLOOR AND WE WENT STRAIGHT THROUGH THE INTERSECTION, UNABLE TO STOP. I PUMPED THEM LIKE CRAZY AND WE SLOWED TO A STOP ABOUT 4 CAR LENGTHS FROM THE STOP SIGN.
